column1: Smoque BBQ////The ribs were extremely tender (came right off the bone) and had just the "right amount of smoke". The rub was so excellent
column2: you didn't need the sauce. Though we did try it. It's not your usually thick tomato type sauce
column3: but very vinegary (very South Carolina). An awesome dipping sauce for your French fries. I would say the same about the pulled pork.
